name: Create Zoom meetings from new rows on a Google Sheet
description:
Use this automation to watch for new rows of data on a Google Sheet and create Zoom meetings with the data. The scenario then updates the sheet with the Join and Share URLs.

This automation uses this [Google Sheet example.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FipHbhc8KWkjcIHEhNqk3pbdHjNxjoR5bX9do7vM5TQ/edit?usp=sharing)
